711 namespace DBus {
712 
713  template <class T_return>
714  DBusCxxPointer<Method<T_return> >
715  Object::create_method( const std::string& method_name, sigc::slot0<T_return> slot )
716  {
717  if ( not m_default_interface )
718  {
719  this->create_interface("");
720  this->set_default_interface("");
721  }
722  // TODO throw an error if the default interface still doesn't exist
723 
724  DBusCxxPointer< Method<T_return> > method;
725  method = m_default_interface->create_method<T_return>(method_name);
726  method->set_method( slot );
727  return method;
728  }
729

850  template <class T_return>
851  DBusCxxPointer<Method<T_return> >
852  Object::create_method( const std::string& interface_name, const std::string& method_name, sigc::slot0<T_return> slot )
853  {
854  Interface::pointer interface;
855  interface = this->interface(interface_name);
856  if ( not interface ) interface = this->create_interface(interface_name);
857  // TODO throw an error if the interface still doesn't exist
858 
859  DBusCxxPointer< Method<T_return> > method;
860  method = interface->create_method<T_return>(method_name);
861  method->set_method( slot );
862  return method;
863  }
864

907  return method;
908  }

910  template <class T_return, class T_arg1,class T_arg2,class T_arg3,class T_arg4>
911  DBusCxxPointer<Method<T_return, T_arg1,T_arg2,T_arg3,T_arg4> >
912  Object::create_method( const std::string& interface_name, const std::string& method_name, sigc::slot4<T_return, T_arg1,T_arg2,T_arg3,T_arg4> slot )
913  {
914  Interface::pointer interface;
915  interface = this->interface(interface_name);
916  if ( not interface ) interface = this->create_interface(interface_name);
917  // TODO throw an error if the interface still doesn't exist
918 
919  DBusCxxPointer< Method<T_return, T_arg1,T_arg2,T_arg3,T_arg4> > method;
920  method = interface->create_method<T_return, T_arg1,T_arg2,T_arg3,T_arg4>(method_name);
921  method->set_method( slot );
922  return method;
923  }

971  template <class T_return>
972  DBusCxxPointer<signal<T_return> >
973  Object::create_signal( const std::string& name )
974  {
975  DBusCxxPointer<DBus::signal<T_return> > sig;
976  Interface::pointer iface = this->default_interface();
977  if ( not iface ) iface = this->create_interface("");
978  sig = iface->create_signal<T_return>(name);
979  return sig;
980  }
